Articles.Content:
Hello everyone, Mediafire links are no longer banned, the original reason (adult 3rd party adverts) seems to be gone, but anyone using Mediafire should know that Mediafire is extremely obnoxious with advertising, even opening new browser windows under your browser to serve you ads.

It is recommended that another file host is used if possible, and recommendations are welcome.

Thanks for the heads up. 

 Most folk will have already migrated over to KerbalX or other hosting sites already but it's good to know they work again. Even if the site does bite hard. 

 Cheers!
It might happen again I suggest using an adblocker.

Question: Does this restore MediaFire links in older forum posts? Or were those mass-edited out?

Edit: To answer my own question: No, the links in old posts are still broken. 

Edited February 14, 2017 by Cydonian Monk
See above.

On 2/13/2017 at 4:18 PM, Cydonian Monk said:

Question: Does this restore MediaFire links in older forum posts? Or were those mass-edited out?

Edit: To answer my own question: No, the links in old posts are still broken. 

Old links will need to be redone, but new ones SHOULD work fine. At least on this end.

On 2/17/2017 at 1:42 PM, Frybert said:

Old links will need to be redone, but new ones SHOULD work fine. At least on this end.

yes i have edited iss comminuty's link
